mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "On the Record and Record Report", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "Getting the Dance on Paper", "Overseas Dateline", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Gate Creek Ranch, Vida, Oregon", "Ladies on the Square", "Round Dance Terminology Standardized", "Faulkner Dances Into the Service", "Report From Keokuk", "Our People in Korea", "Gems From Area Publications", "Style Series: Dip n'n Dive-3 Ladies Chain", "National Convention", "Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month: Stan Burdick", "Paging the Roundancers: Campbell and Genny McCord" and "Experimental Lab: Clever and Anything".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
